hadiths.text: Narrated AbuSa'id al-Khudri: A man emigrated to the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) from the Yemen. He asked (him): Have you anyone (of your relatives) in the Yemen? He replied: My parents. He asked: Did they permit you? He replied: No. He said: Go back to them and ask for their permission. If they permit you, then fight (in the path of Allah), otherwise be devoted to them

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يَغْزُو وَأَبَوَاهُ كَارِهَانِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding A Man Who Goes To Battle While His Parents Object
